hero.name: Gorkem Pasaoglu
hero.bio: Born in Ankara in 1999. Graduated from Kırıkkale University Computer Engineering department with a 3.20 GPA, <bold>ranking 3rd in the department</bold>.

education.title: Education
education.details: 3.20 GPA / <bold>3rd in Dept</bold>. Coursework: Data Structures, OOP, Database Systems, Software Engineering.

skills.title: Skills
skills.list: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, NodeJS, NextJS, Tailwind CSS, Git, MsSQL

carna.description: I work as a Frontend Developer at Carna Digital. I play an active role in the development of large-scale projects, building user-centric, high-performance, and scalable interfaces using modern web technologies. I also contribute to backend processes with native technologies and Node.js when necessary, delivering end-to-end solutions.

freelance.description: Working as a freelance React developer on various projects. Enhancing both technical and design skills across different sectors.

twoc.description: Focused on frontend development with React. Participated in 'TURKCELL Digital Transformation', 'BOTAŞ Electronic Bulletin', and 'Garanti Bank Compass' projects. Used microservices architecture, Swagger, and SCSS.

popupsmart.description: Assisted in version migration. Gained experience in dynamic JavaScript typing, SEO-friendly, performance-oriented, and observable web application development.

limak.description: Focused on frontend development with React and created web pages with dynamic components.

responsive.title: Fully Responsive Design
responsive.description: Every project I build is crafted to deliver a seamless experience across all devices—from mobile phones to desktop computers.
responsive.desktopDesc: Layouts that leverage large screens with optimized spacing, typography, and interactive elements for an immersive desktop experience.
responsive.mobileDesc: Touch-friendly interfaces with intuitive navigation, ensuring perfect usability on smartphones and tablets of all sizes.
responsive.bottomText: Responsive design is not just a feature—it's a fundamental principle in all my work, ensuring accessibility and usability for every user.

performance.title: Performance & SEO Excellence
performance.description: I prioritize web performance, accessibility, and SEO best practices in every project I build. Here are the Google Lighthouse scores from one of my recent projects.
performance.cardDescription: These scores reflect my commitment to building high-performance web applications. Each metric represents a critical aspect of modern web development: fast loading times, accessible interfaces, industry best practices, and search engine optimization.
performance.bottomText: Achieving high Lighthouse scores demonstrates my commitment to building fast, accessible, and SEO-optimized web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.

gsapCTA.title: Want to see what I can do with GSAP?
gsapCTA.description: Explore my advanced animation capabilities with scroll-triggered effects, smooth transitions, and creative interactions.

GsapPage.step1Desc: Creating pixel-perfect, mobile-first interfaces that adapt seamlessly across all devices. Every element is carefully crafted to provide an optimal viewing experience.
GsapPage.step2Desc: Implementing best practices for fast load times and smooth animations. Achieving high Lighthouse scores through code splitting, lazy loading, and efficient asset management.
GsapPage.step3Desc: Bringing designs to life with GSAP-powered animations. From subtle micro-interactions to bold scroll-triggered effects that engage and delight users.
GsapPage.cardsSubtitle: Discover what makes GSAP the industry standard for web animations.
GsapPage.card1Desc: Create stunning animations that respond to user scroll position. Perfect for storytelling and creating engaging user experiences that guide visitors through your content.
GsapPage.card2Desc: Orchestrate complex animation sequences with precise timing. Chain multiple animations together, control playback, and create cinematic effects with ease.
GsapPage.card3Desc: Add depth to your designs with 3D rotations, perspective effects, and multi-layered parallax scrolling. Create immersive experiences that stand out.
GsapPage.card4Desc: GSAP is built for performance. Hardware-accelerated animations run at 60fps, ensuring smooth experiences across all devices and browsers.
GsapPage.parallaxDesc: Explore the powerful features that make GSAP the industry standard for web animation
GsapPage.morphDesc: Watch as SVG shapes smoothly transform and colors blend with scroll-driven animations
GsapPage.finalDesc: These are just a few examples of what I can create with GSAP. From subtle micro-interactions to bold cinematic effects, I bring websites to life with smooth, performant animations.
